page.title: 19Law & Order Droxford Police
page.content: My Daddy is a police sergeant.He works at{Droxford}Detached Station;manned 2hrs a day.The rest of the time the men are on patrol.6 men work here.They patrol in a car,motor cycles & bikes. Radios always with them.They deal with all types of crime apart from major or more complicated matters.Next to the police station is a Magistrates Court. 2 cells in the station for short stays until the prisoner has been dealt with by the court.The most common crime is theft from cars in local beauty spots. Recently attacks on horses in the area Deer are more numerous,they are trapped at night with dogs by poachers N of{Droxford}are the Hambledon Hunt hounds,hunting starts after harvest, police have to provent breaches of the peace_keen anti_hunt saboteurs.
